thread.title: A tick off the old bucket list
thread.title_full: A tick off the old bucket list | News24

author: news24.com
title: A tick off the old bucket list
text:
One tick off the bucket list..
There is nothing as awarding as crossing the finish line after running a 10km fun run. This weekend Prestige Academy & God.TV competed in the Gun Run race in Mouille Point. Doing a fun run is but one of the things we can all tick off on our bucket-lists.
Sure, everyone can jog around the block but the fun lies in companionship whilst doing the race.
Running with a chatty friend; having them motivate you makes it all worthwhile.
Even though the competition was tough the crowd was hungry to start and we hopped on the bandwagon.
What a fun day it was! Pushing ourselves to the limit never felt as good as when we crossed that finish line.
And we’re just normal people doing something which made us feel extraordinary. Next time we’ll take on the half marathon challenge!
